tiles.name: Luxury Apartments Sector A
tiles.description: Elevated apartments with glass walkways and algorithmic control systems. Part of the Skywalk District, designed for the city's elite.

tiles.name: Nexus Hub Access Point
tiles.description: Entrance to a vital network infrastructure hub. Heavily guarded, potentially with hidden access points to the Echoes network.

tiles.name: Veridian Veil Perimeter Checkpoint
tiles.description: A reinforced security checkpoint along the edge of the Veridian Veil energy dome. Metallic structures and constant surveillance.

tiles.name: Luxury Apartments Sector B
tiles.description: Identical to Sector A, but with subtle differences that could indicate a higher concentration of 'decommissioned' individuals.

tiles.name: Central Skywalk Plaza
tiles.description: A large open area above the city streets with multiple walkways and access points to buildings. Synthetic surfaces and minimal water features (reservoirs).

tiles.name: Former Residence
tiles.description: Identical looking residential apartment, could be Sera's parents' former residence, now potentially under surveillance.

tiles.name: Skygarden Reservoir
tiles.description: Artificial greenery and controlled water reservoir in top level skygarden. Provides some escape for those who can reach it

tiles.name: Echoes Network Access Point
tiles.description: A hidden and obscured access point to the digital realm for members of the Echoes. Could be in an alley or backroom.

tiles.name: Surveillance Hub
tiles.description: Central control room for the surveillance systems in the Skywalk District. Metallic structures and advanced technology.
